methods.name: show_help_topic
methods.summary: Look for and, if found, show a help topic.
methods.description: Requests that the help backend look for a help topic and, if found, show it. If the topic is found, it will be shown via a Show Help notification. If the topic is not found, no notification will be delivered.

schema.description: Whether the topic was found and shown. Topics are shown via a Show Help notification.
